forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 71, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. Southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 10am. Mostly cloudy. High near 79, with temperatures falling to around 77 in the afternoon. West wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. North wind 3 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 78. East northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. North wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
